title.narrative: Agricultural Development: Agriculture Sector Rehabilitation Project

description.narrative: The project's development goal is to reduce post-conflict poverty and food insecurity, and improve livelihoods and living conditions of rural communities. This will be achieved through the project objective to support short-term recovery of rural communities and their farming systems, while laying the basis for long-term rehabilitation and participatory development. The anticipated outputs of the project will include: (a) Restored and improved agricultural production capacity and household food security; (b) Strengthened community and farmer-based organizations; (c) Established mechanisms for participatory community development; and (d) Rehabilitated and expanded rural infrastructure.

name.narrative: Agricultural Development: Agriculture Sector Rehabilitation Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
